channel.title: Webclient Background
channel.description:
I'm going to need something large and fascinating, I'd rather most of the colors to be a cyan blue or deep blue color... This is going to be fore my web-client background, And truthfully who wants to see a pitch black background? The server name is "DreamScape" Try to mainly stick with the color blue... If you wish to add another color such as red.. make it go along with the background... I will speak good of you.. And Ill be glad to see the designs everyone makes.. :D Sincerely, Trade me
EDIT: I went through all the other posts in this section, And I now see that you guys are pretty specific on what your doing... To make your job easier.. Ill help you.. I'd like a deep blue background, with cyan blue smoke coming from several directions SMOKE EXAMPLE: http://images2.layoutsparks.com/1/171283/blue-smoke-aqua-green.jpg NO, I don't want the smoke copy and pasted, and no I don't want the smoke exactly there... I want it coming from various direction.. Surprise me... Id also like a wizard or skeleton or a wizard skeleton holding a crystal ball in one of his hands.. Make sure to put most off this away from the center of the screen as the web-client would be covering it... Also add players pking.. and add it somewhat shaded under the blue..
Lol, I dont know really, Thats about as specific as I can get...

item.title: Webclient Background
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

I’m going to need something large and fascinating, I’d rather most of the colors to be a cyan blue or deep blue color…
This is going to be fore my web-client background, And truthfully who wants to see a pitch black background?
The server name is “DreamScape”
Try to mainly stick with the color blue… If you wish to add another color such as red… make it go along with the background…
I will speak good of you… And Ill be glad to see the designs everyone makes…
Sincerely, Trade me

EDIT:
I went through all the other posts in this section, And I now see that you guys are pretty specific on what your doing…
To make your job easier… Ill help you…
I’d like a deep blue background, with cyan blue smoke coming from several directions
SMOKE EXAMPLE: http://images2.layoutsparks.com/1/171283/blue-smoke-aqua-green.jpg
NO, I don’t want the smoke copy and pasted, and no I don’t want the smoke exactly there…
I want it coming from various direction… Surprise me…
Id also like a wizard or skeleton or a wizard skeleton holding a crystal ball in one of his hands…
Make sure to put most off this away from the center of the screen as the web-client would be covering it…
Also add players pking… and add it somewhat shaded under the blue…

Lol, I dont know really, Thats about as specific as I can get…

Read full topic
